pr_title: Enable customization of gRPC channel from Axon Framework application

timeline.message: Allow further customization of managed channel to Axon Server through configuration of a ManagedChannelCustomizer.

timeline.bodyText: Can we add a test that such a channelCustomization is actually invoked upon creation of the AxonServerConnectionManager?
timeline.author: smcvb
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -186,6 +189,21 @@ public Builder tagsConfiguration(TagsConfiguration tagsConfiguration) { return this; } + /** + * Registers the given {@code channelCustomization}, which configures the underling {@link ManagedChannelBuilder} used + * to set up connections to AxonServer. + *

+ * This method may be used in case none of the operations on this Builder provide support for the required + * feature. + * + * @param channelCustomization A function defining the customization to make on the ManagedChannelBuilder + * @return this builder for further configuration + */ + public Builder channelCustomizer(UnaryOperator> channelCustomization) {

timeline.bodyText: Curious: would you need to add @FunctionalInterface on this level too or is that taken over from the UnaryOperator automatically?
timeline.author: smcvb

replies.bodyText: Apparently not taken super interface, so added this.
replies.author: MGathier

timeline.bodyText: This addition serves a simple additional verification in the AxonServerAutoConfigurationTest I think.
timeline.author: smcvb
